message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it!
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer. I think I can pay $90 for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob. I can see you're interested in the product, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need $110 for it.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I believe I can pay $100 for the product.
I'm glad you're still interested in the product, Bob. I can see you're close to the price I'm looking for. I'm willing to meet you at $115, but I'm not going any lower than that.
Alice, thank you for your offer. I think I can pay $110 for the product.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $112, but I'm not going any lower than that. This is my final offer.
Alice, I appreciate your efforts. I think I can pay $111 for the product.
I'm getting a bit desperate, Bob. I need to make a profit, but I'm willing to compromise. I can meet you at $109, but that's as low as I can go.
